mapper.insert: insert into article (id, userId, sortId, labelId, articleCover, articleTitle, videoUrl, viewCount, likeCount, viewStatus, password, tips, recommendStatus, commentStatus, createTime, updateTime, updateBy, deleted, articleContent) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleCover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viewStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommendStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{commentStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{articleContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update article set userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sortId = #{sortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, labelId = #{labelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, articleCover = #{articleCover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, articleTitle = #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, videoUrl = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, viewCount = #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, likeCount = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, viewStatus = #{viewStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tips = #{tips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommendStatus = #{recommendStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, commentStatus = #{commentStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateBy = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, articleContent = #{articleContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userId, sortId, labelId, articleCover, articleTitle, videoUrl, viewCount, likeCount, viewStatus, password, tips, recommendStatus, commentStatus, createTime, updateTime, updateBy, deleted, articleContent from article where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
